brief_summary.textblock:
Cryoballoon ablation of paroxysmal atrial fibrillation can be used as first-line therapy
      compared to second choice after failed medical therapy

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of Cryoballoon Ablation of Atrial Fibrillation as First-line Therapy

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  paroxysmal atrial fibrillation, symptomatic

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  atrial fibrillation other than PAF, asymptomatic, previous AF ablation

facility.name: Yuksek Ihtisas Heart-Education and Research Hospital

primary_outcome.description: At prespecified interval of 12th month from the index procedure occurence of Recurrent atrial fibrillation, atrial flutter and atrial tachycardia ( Number of Participants with Recurrent atrial fibrillation, atrial flutter and atrial tachycardia )was assessed using ambulatory holter ECG monitoring
primary_outcome.measure: Recurrent atrial fibrillation, atrial flutter and atrial tachycardia (composite)

primary_outcome.description: At prespecified interval of 3rd month from the index procedure occurence of Recurrent atrial fibrillation, atrial flutter and atrial tachycardia ( Number of Participants with Recurrent atrial fibrillation, atrial flutter and atrial tachycardia )was assessed using ambulatory holter ECG monitoring
primary_outcome.measure: Recurrent atrial fibrillation, atrial flutter and atrial tachycardia (composite)

primary_outcome.description: At prespecified interval of 6th month from the index procedure occurence of Recurrent atrial fibrillation, atrial flutter and atrial tachycardia ( Number of Participants with Recurrent atrial fibrillation, atrial flutter and atrial tachycardia )was assessed using ambulatory holter ECG monitoring
primary_outcome.measure: Recurrent atrial fibrillation, atrial flutter and atrial tachycardia (composite)

primary_outcome.description: At prespecified interval of 9th month from the index procedure occurence of Recurrent atrial fibrillation, atrial flutter and atrial tachycardia ( Number of Participants with Recurrent atrial fibrillation, atrial flutter and atrial tachycardia )was assessed using ambulatory holter ECG monitoring
primary_outcome.measure: Recurrent atrial fibrillation, atrial flutter and atrial tachycardia (composite)

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Safety/Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, Masking: Single Blind (Subject), Primary Purpose: Treatment
